attributes.action: Trump should visit Birmingham and the Midlands.
attributes.additional_details: this petition does not support trumps politics and simply wants him to visit the region as a matter of greater security, better visit and a benefit to the region as a whole.
attributes.background: Trump would be much more welcome in the midlands then in the south, especially London. More people from around the country could come to his rally as  the midlands itself is the most central part of the country. As the heartland of brexit trumps visit to the midlands would make perfect sense.

rejection.details:
The UK Government isn’t responsible for making the final decision about the programme for a state visit. The Government does discuss the options for the programme with the visiting government. However, the final decision on whether they take up the Government’s suggestions would be for the visiting government to make. The UK Government can’t force a visiting government to include a particular visit in the programme.

You could start a new petition urging the UK Government to encourage President Trump to visit Birmingham and the Midlands.
